name: The Unoriginal Game
description:
This game was created within few days as a first completed my project, and it's full of the unoriginal ideas. The idea to make this game came when I was watching Brackeys video "How to MAKE YOUR GAME LOOK GOOD!", then I decided that I want to make a game like this.

CONTROLS
  • ← → - Movement
  • ↑ - Jump
  • R - Restart level form the last checkpoint
  • Esc - End game
